MAIN_MESSAGE: There is power cut in the G3 area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Cedar Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:50am. Our engineers are on their way to the local area to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:30 AM on Monday, 15 February 2021.
